author: rhuijben
msg: Update more things in the update editor to wc_db apis. This time
the add_file() handling. Implement a few of the suggestions by
gstein and also apply these same changes to the already converted
(IS_NODE_PRESENT): Add macro to simplify some checks.
Use the db status instead of hidden checks. Handle not present
directories that are in the local file system as unversioned.
(add_file): Check for conflicts before anything else. Check against
administrative directory name. Use common switched and root check.
Verify in-working copy state for missing files.

author: rhuijben
msg: (svn_wc__db_status_t): Following up on r40071, update documentation to allow
using the status on other node types.

author: rhuijben
msg: Move the arguments of several new in 1.7 svn_wc_() functions to be
more consistent with each other. See svn_wc.h for more details
No functional changes and no internal api changes.
(svn_wc_walk_status): Add new in 1.7 and reorder arguments.

author: julianfoad
msg: When in `--dry-run' mode of `svn merge' command, property conflicts made an
interactive callback to the user to resolve the conflicts, unlike the text
conflicts. Suppress the interactive callback in `--dry-run' mode.
(maybe_generate_propconflict): Check for `--dry-run' mode and set the
boolean `conflict_remains', instead of invoking the interactive
